name: TransfusionCPTICD9ICD10PCSCodesForExposureIdentification
title: Transfusion CPT, ICD9, ICD10PCS codes for exposure identification
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Blood component transfusion CPT, ICD9, ICD10PCS codes for identification of potential biologics-related adverse events.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element in the QDM category of Procedure/Intervention, Immunization, Medication, or Substance.),(Inclusion Criteria: Blood component CPT, ICD9, ICD10PCS codes.),(Exclusion Criteria: None)
